title: Non - play events
custom_steps:
WHEN user watches a non-play event story
AND story has players and/or team
custom_expected:
THEN team logo and headshot should be displayed on the game story
AND story should display the title and no description

title: MLB Stories SEO
custom_steps: WHEN user watches the MLB Story

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Player Stories SEO have 'player name - MLB Player Stories' format

Ex “Mike Trout - MLB Player Stories”

THEN Editorial Stories have 'player name career timeline - MLB Stories' format

Ex “Mike Trout career timeline - MLB Stories”

title: Conviva - Reporting of Successful Video Playback
Conviva - Backgrounding, Phone/Tablet Sleep, Incoming Phone Call
custom_steps: When I background the app or put the phone/tablet to sleep or receive an incoming phone call
custom_expected: Then the background and foreground events should be reported

title: Conviva - Close of Session
custom_preconds: Given the video is being watched
custom_expected:
Then the monitoring session should be cleaned up
And the concurrent plays metric should be updated

title: Conviva - End of Session
custom_expected:
Then the monitoring session should be cleaned up
And the ended plays and concurrent plays metrics should be updated

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user watches Player Story
(Player -> select a player)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN story populates fine without any issues

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user watches Editorial Story
(Home tab)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN story populates fine without any issues

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user watches Personalized Story
(Home tab)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN story populates fine without any issues
THEN story populates fine without any issues

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user watches Game Preview Story 
(Scores - Story for upcoming game)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN story populates fine without any issues

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's device language is set to English
AND user is watching the story
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN story is displayed in English

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's device language is set to Spanish
AND user is watching the story
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN story is displayed in Spanish

title: Last Story of the Game Stories

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the last slide of the Game Story
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN 'More Game Stories' link is displayed 
AND user is able to click or swipe up

custom_steps_separated.content: WEHN user clicks or swipes up
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the 'More MLB Game Stories' modal is displayed
AND user is able to scroll through the list to see the games

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the story of selected game starts playing
THEN some stories have CTAs (ex ads, MLB.tv and etc)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to the correct page
AND CTA link opens in a new tab (confirm)

title: Play Info in Player Story
custom_steps: WHEN user watches the Player Story
custom_expected: THEN user sees the play info (ex pitch type, pitch speed, spin rate, exit velocity, launch angle, hit distance)

title: BTS link in Game Preview Stories
custom_steps:
WHEN user watches the Game Preview Stories
AND the team submits their lineup
custom_expected: THEN slide gets created with BTS link in Game Preview Stories
